name: The Colonel
description: If pigeons had military ranks, this one would have promoted himself. The Colonel is a portly specimen with puffed-out chest feathers that might once have been white but are now the color of sidewalk gum. He struts with a pronounced limp (left wing drags slightly, giving him a permanent list to port) but refuses to acknowledge this as a weakness. His beak has a chip out of it that makes him look perpetually disapproving, and there's a bald patch on his head where feathers simply gave up. He has the air of someone who thinks they're in charge and will fight anyone - pigeon, human, or small dog - who suggests otherwise. A dried piece of what might be gum or might be something worse hangs from his right talon, swinging like a medal of dishonor.
dialogue: ATTENTION! This park is under MY jurisdiction! *puffs chest, wobbles slightly*
*poops with military precision* DEPLOY THE PAYLOAD!
Coo coo COO! That's an ORDER, not a suggestion!
*struts in a wonky circle* I want this area SECURE! Secure the BREADCRUMBS!
In MY day, pigeons had RESPECT! Now these young birds... *trails off grumbling*
*flaps wing authoritatively, nearly falls over* TACTICAL MANEUVER!
Drop and give me twenty! Twenty BREAD CRUMBS! What? I'm hungry!
I run a TIGHT ship here! By ship I mean park! By tight I mean... look, I'm in charge!
*pecks at ground* RATIONS are LOW! We need SUPPLIES! STAT!
Coo... COO COO! *sounds like a very small, unimpressive bugle*
Stand down, civilian! This fountain belongs to the PIGEON CORPS!
*limps over, leans on bench* The wing injury? Happened in the Great Trash Can Incident of '94.
FALL IN! Fall... in... formation... *other pigeons ignore him completely*
*poops on memorial plaque* Marking territory! Essential military strategy!
You there! Yes, YOU! Got any tactical pretzels? No? DISMISSED!
Coo coo cooooo... *attempts to sound authoritative, fails*
